org.universalradio.radioservice

Interface RadioServiceDab

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RadioService

    public interface RadioServiceDab
extends RadioService

You may obtain a copy of the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.     Fabian Sattler, IRT GmbH

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getEnsembleEcc()
      Returns the extended country code (ECC) for the DAB Ensemble this RadioServiceDab belongs to
      long getEnsembleFrequency()
      Returns the frequency in kHz of the DAB Ensemble, this RadioServiceDab belongs to
      java.lang.String getEnsembleId()
      Returns the DAB Ensemble ID, this RadioServiceDab belongs to, as hex-string
      java.lang.String getEnsembleLabel()
      Returns the label of the DAB Ensemble, this RadioServiceDab belongs to
      java.util.List<RadioServiceDabComponent> getServiceComponents()
      Returns a list with the RadioServiceDabComponents associated with this RadioServiceDab
      java.lang.String getServiceEcc()
      Returns the service extended country code
      java.lang.String getServiceId()
      Returns the service id as hex-string
      java.lang.String getServiceLabel()
      Returns the label of this RadioServiceDab
      boolean isProgrammeService()
      Indicates if this RadioServiceDab is a DAB programme or a DAB data service
